name: Flightfox
headline: A platform to plan, book and manage global and group travel.
description: Flightfox is a travel management platform for organizations with complex travel needs. We combine technology with human expertise to plan, search, book, monitor and manage global and group travel. We typically work with study abroad programs, humanitarian organizations, and other organizations with global reach.

founders.name: Lauren Sullivan
founders.description:
Founder and Product leader with 12+ years of tech and marketplace experience.
Co-founder + CTO of Float Health (YC W22).
Co-founder of Flightfox (YC S12).

# **Complex Travel Made****Easy**
Book and manage flights, hotels, and more for your educational institution, humanitarian group, or business with the help of our unique platform and expert support team
[Try for Free](http://flightfox.com/<https:/app.flightfox.com/login>)[Book a Demo](http://flightfox.com/<https:/app.flightfox.com/login>)
![Flightfox dashboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6596a15eb8b5e2db3252b89d_flightfox-dashboard.png)
![Lowest airfares guaranteed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6596a9088fbb4272e309afbe_Frame%201217%403x.png)
![Expert Travel Support, 24/7 Chat Support, 10+ Languages, Worldwide Support](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6596a908766aa0acf80c4f64_Frame%201301%403x.png)
![Largest flight & hotel inventory](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6596a90864dfbd73acca946e_Frame%201302%403x.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597c0d0cfc5fa33fe5021d2_shape-grey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597c0d0cfc5fa33fe5021d2_shape-grey.png)
### **Trusted by****2,000+****companies** around the world
![CIEE logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597d552da9885e0a8184092_ciee-logo%404x.png)![ZENYSIS logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597d55366025cd6d3091926_zenysis-logo%404x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/66031d1b33a5547ba1dc3a08_atlas-free-logo.png)![Pitcher logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597d552eb07a4bb88d95d3f_pitchers-logo%404x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6602f4ac4fb9892364720a98_vida-logo-transparent.png)![UpGuard logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597d5527ae415635fafb70c_upguard-logo%404x.png)![Coulisse logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597d552411cd9c913612264_coulisse-logo%404x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/66031ba61e1271573d0370a1_medlife-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6602f2e5240676f37624938a_hintsa-logo-2024.png)

## **Tailored Travel Solutions** for Every Group
[Educational Institutions](http://flightfox.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Humanitarian Trips](http://flightfox.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Corporate Offsites](http://flightfox.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
### Whether you're coordinating travel for 50 students from one airport or 5,000 from many different airports, **we've got you covered**.
Student travel can be tricky, especially with unaccompanied minors. Our team regularly supports institutions of all sizes and ensures the proper documentation is in place for groups of minors traveling with or without a chaperone. We’re also equipped to handle college sports teams or music groups, managing oversized or special baggage with ease. Plus, our platform provides real-time alerts, allowing you to track your students' travel status and ensure their safety every step of the way.
[Learn More](http://flightfox.com/</solutions/educational-institutions>)
### **Ideal for:**
  * 
Study Abroad Programs
  * 
K-12 Schools
  * 
Universities & Colleges


  * 
Charter Schools
  * 
Private Schools
  * 
School Districts


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671a20a4afe676540d04fa7d_Organise%20Complex%20Travel.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/6597ec76f4658c0cb5a391e9_Frame%201150%403x%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671a20a431837c808a0dc5ae_Full%20Visibility.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671a20a4b76eb946b1407c8c_Full%20Control.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671a20a4e4a5d407d943e930_Home%20Educational.webp)
### When you're coordinating travel for large groups, both **finances** and **safety** **are key**.
With our bulk flight, hotel, and venue deals, you’re guaranteed the best price. And with our 24/7 global support, our team monitors travel risk alerts and is ready to assist your group in case of an emergency. Plus, our platform tracks and manages your CO2 emissions so that you can choose an option that minimizes your effect on the environment. No matter where your mission takes you, we’re with you every step of the way.
[Learn More](http://flightfox.com/</solutions/humanitarian-trips>)
### **Ideal for:**
  * 
Non-profits
  * 
Volunteer Groups
  * 
Humanitarian Organizations


  * 
Religious Missions
  * 
Church & Clergy


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671f64b7cce25d8a10c4174a_Humanitarian%20Fares.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/67223272cb5677795825e1be_Frame%202191.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671a20a4a38c912c674a8c34_Experts%20Travel%20Support.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671f64b7c2cbb80bf047a79e_Minimize%20your%20CO2%20emissions.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671f6dac45331f6a51427abb_Guaranteed%20Lowest%20Price.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671f64b84fb698bf0a960014_Humanitarian%20Trips.webp)
### As a remote-first company, we know the value of in-person retreats and make the planning process **easy** and **seamless**.
Our platform combines intuitive technology with a dedicated travel assistant, ready to handle everything from last-minute changes to coordinating with airlines on your behalf. As a one-stop shop, we also offer bulk hotel and venue discounts, ensuring you get the best value. From booking to account reporting, we take care of every detail so you can focus on what matters most.
[Learn More](http://flightfox.com/</solutions/corporate-offsites>)
### **Ideal for:**

Offsites

## **Why Choose** Flightfox?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b57b383fdc5c52b7ff_Callcenter.svg)
### 24/7 Customer Support
Contact our travel experts anytime, anywhere
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b734c68bfecefd791c_Reports.svg)
### Custom Reporting
Save time with our custom reporting system, able to create any report needed from CO2 emissions to flight manifests and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b831fee82d1370657e_Updates.svg)
### Real-Time Flight Updates
Always stay informed and one step ahead
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b6f9c76edecae920d2_Experts.svg)
### Experts in Complex Travel
Every year, we navigate the intentional travel of large groups and thousands of minors, both chaperoned and unchaperoned
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b5bd3bf8399ac608d3_Check.svg)
### Travel Day Support
Enjoy stress-free travel with support from your dedicated account manager
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b70923ab93604b795d_Staff.svg)

Do it yourself with our high-tech platform or delegate the task to our team
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b772ef59ed7a843623_Inventory.svg)

Know you got the best deal for your flight, hotel, car, or venue, guaranteed
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b5c5f0ddc62605aeb9_Customization.svg)
### Platform Customization
Use customized landing pages with your logo for travelers to sign up for the trip
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6593c83ac996e820951427d6/671eb9b6420cf850292a773e_Dollar.svg)
### Flexible Payment Plans
Pay by credit card, receive an invoice directly, or let us charge your customers on your behalf

### Whether you're coordinating travel for 50 students from one airport or 5,000 from many different airports, **we've got you covered**.
Student travel can be tricky, especially with unaccompanied minors. Our team regularly supports institutions of all sizes and ensures the proper documentation is in place for groups of minors traveling with or without a chaperone. We’re also equipped to handle college sports teams or music groups, managing oversized or special baggage with ease. Plus, our platform provides real-time alerts, allowing you to track your students' travel status and ensure their safety every step of the way.

generated_description:
Flightfox is a travel management platform that simplifies the often complex needs of organizations when it comes to global and group travel. Founded in 2012 and based in Boulder, Colorado, it's part of the Y Combinator Batch S12—a recognized incubator for startups. The company currently operates with a dedicated team of 25 employees.

### Mission and Services
Flightfox aims to streamline the travel planning process by combining sophisticated technology with experienced human support. They primarily cater to educational institutions (like universities and study abroad programs), humanitarian groups, and corporations needing to coordinate corporate offsites. 

The platform allows users to book flights, hotels, and manage logistics for a wide range of travelers—whether it’s for 50 students or 5,000 participants scattered over multiple locations. Their services include:
- **Real-time travel alerts** for monitoring and managing safety.
- **24/7 customer support** to assist users at any time.
- **Custom reporting** for better visibility into travel expenses and CO2 emissions.
- A significant inventory of flights and hotels, which secures competitive pricing through bulk deals.

### Target Audience
Flightfox targets three primary groups:
1. **Educational Institutions**: Helping manage travel for study abroad programs, K-12 schools, and universities, addressing the specific needs of student travel, including unaccompanied minors.
2. **Humanitarian Organizations**: Supporting non-profits and volunteer groups with budget-friendly options and handling the logistics of mission-driven travel.
3. **Corporate Clients**: Assisting businesses with offsites, retreats, and conferences by ensuring a stress-free experience with dedicated travel management.

### Why Choose Flightfox?
With over 2,000 companies around the globe relying on their expertise, Flightfox is designed to make complex travel hassle-free. They promise advantages such as guaranteed lowest fares, extensive travel inventory, and a personalized booking experience. The platform is intuitive, allowing users to either book travel independently or delegate the task to Flightfox’s team.

In essence, Flightfox stands out by offering tailored solutions that cater to the unique travel needs of organizations, backed by expert support to ensure every aspect of group travel is coordinated seamlessly. 

For more information, visit their website at [Flightfox](http://flightfox.com).
